page.title: 13HUNDLETON COUNCIL,PEMBROKE.
page.content: At a recent meeting of{Hundleton {Community Council}the following matters were reported. {Cricket Pitch.}_It was reported that a sub-committee had met in August to disscus the contents of the lease drawn up by the solicitors. {Probation service.}_A letter was read asking if the council had any work that could be done under a community service scheme within the next twelve months.Councillors agreed to let various organisations in the community know. {Highways.}_A letter was received from the highways department stating that it was not possible to provide any more passing bays in the Bentlass Hill Road.
